attributes.action: Give ALL key workers a one-off tax free payment of £500.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of key workers feel undervalued. The Government can recognise their work and efforts during the Covid-19 pandemic by the provision of a financial payment.
attributes.background: The Government to give ALL key workers, including but not limited to Police Officers and Community Support Officers, NHS Nurses and NHS Support Workers, Firefighters, Supermarket Staff, Care Home Workers, a 'one-off' tax free payment of £500 in gratitude of their work and effort during the pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
